# test program
#start to define instructions
INSTR:51
00000101000011001000 #load data from memory 200 to R01
00000000000000000000 #HLT
00001001000011001010 #store R01 into memory 202
00000000000000000000 #HLT
00010001000011001001 #add memory 201 to R01
00000000000000000000 #HLT
00000110000011001011 # load data from memory 203 to R02
00000000000000000000 #HLT 
00011110000011111111 # subtract immediate#255 from R02
00000000000000000000 #HLT
00001010000011001100 # store R02 into memory 204
00000000000000000000 #HLT
10100100010011001100 # load index register X01 from memory 205
11011100000000000000		#END of program
#start to define data portion
DATA:200
10010000000000000010  #200 value: -458750
10010000000100000010  #201 value: -458494
01000100000000100010  #202 value: 278562
00000100000000100010 #203 value: 16418
00000001001101110100 #204 memory data 4980
